name: Facebook - Full Width
description: Removes the wasted space on the left-hand and right-hand side on the Newsfeed, Permalink, Timeline, and much more!
additional_info:
*** July 2019 Update ***  

Been dogfooding these edits in FF52 (32bit) for a while now, but they appear to also work in FF60 and some recent version of Chromium I was using for a while.

*** June 2018 Update ***

I've been beta testing these upgrades for a few weeks now on Firefox 52.  I hope they work out for you.

*** end of update ***

Dogfooding these updates since Sep 2017, but could not update the userstyle due to unscheduled downtime.

Questions, concerns, Paypal gifts: userstyles.org@m2020.com

NOTE:  If you figure out how to fix something that Facebook recently broke before I do, send me your code.  I might incorporate your work into the next release.  :-)

discussions.name: Members list can't be viewed properly
Only works on some page types when installed as GreaseMonkey script
Generally works, chokes on pages, notification pulldown, etc
